speaker: Speaker 1
text: So here are the seven things you're listening for. I'm listening for seven different categories, seven layers. Facts and emotions, values, beliefs, motivators, currency and worth. I am listening to a conversation with laser precision, which is a life and death listening skills that I need. And will benefit you in your negotiation when you figure people out so that you can find leverage on them and influence their behaviour. If you only come at this from your perspective, you'll never win them over. You might get compliance, but you won't get buy in. There's a difference.
